edu.uci.isr.impromptu.pie
Class Coordinate

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.isr.impromptu.pie.Coordinate
public class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object

Coordinate for a dot. Copied from Kari's code. The center of the pie is (0,0). The radius and theta is just like normal polar system. X increases rightwards. Y increases downwards.

Author:
Jie Ren
